channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Beauty's New Frontier: Social Commerce And The Future Of Retail
item.description: What sets today's social commerce apart from earlier digital retail experiments is the sophistication of its underlying technology.

item.title: Work Smarter, Not Harder: The Future Of AI Agents
item.description: If automation is part of your team’s strategic plan moving forward, here are several considerations to keep in mind.

item.title: If You Can Trust An Airplane’s Autopilot, You Can Trust AI
item.description: Data that is resistant to the risks of AI can first be organized by AI-powered information management solutions.

item.title: Apple’s iPhone Update—Why You Need To Change Your Messaging App
item.description: You’re not ready for this update — here’s what you do.

item.title: iOS 19: Next iPhone Software To Let Users Ditch Siri In Surprise Change, Report Claims
item.description: Apple’s opening up of the iPhone could continue with something nobody saw coming: the ability to choose a different voice assistant.

item.title: “They’re not paying me enough to care”

item.title: The Impact Matrix: Moving to the golden quadrant

item.title: Getting to next
item.description: There’s a difference between ‘rich’ and ‘richer’. And ‘fit’ and ‘fitter’. The problem with a pre-amp that goes all the way to 11 isn’t that it’s loude...

item.title: How many more in the bag?

item.title: Embracing the Rotten Tomato gap
